name: Infectious Media
tag_list: real-time-advertising, ad-exchange, display-media, media-buying, real-time-bidding, media-valuation, data-driven-display, dsp
overview:
Infectious Media are specialists in intelligent online display. We combine advanced analytics with proprietary targeting and optimisation tools to power efficient real-time display advertising.

How are we different?

• Advertising Intelligence: We unlock the value of advertiser data, to produce actionable, insightful audience intelligence. Our proprietary technology Impression Desk™ uses unique analytics, targeting and optimisation tools deliver an intelligence layer above and beyond that of a standard DSP.

• Direct response plus much more: We’ve developed our tools and campaign services to meet the needs of advertisers throughout the entire sales and marketing process; from awareness generation, customer acquisition and personalised retargeting, to cross and up selling to existing customers.

• 100% Advertiser Focused: Unlike Ad Networks, we have no obligations or pre buying commitments to publishers. All ad slots are sourced directly from real-time ad exchanges, ensuring targeting, bid management and optimisation decisions are made exclusively in the interests of the advertiser.

• Transparency and control: Our bespoke performance dashboards translate audience and campaign performance data into meaningful management information. Providing transparency on which creative messages, target audiences and supply sources are driving performance, while delivering insight for future campaign opportunities.
